Today, [[Jordan Holmes|Jordan]] is on a work-cation to London, so [[Dan Friesen|Dan]] tells "Fill In Jordan" (and fantastic comedian) [[Tyler Snodgrass]] all about what's happened this week on [[The Alex Jones Show]]. Topics covered include:

*Is Alex Jones a hypocrite about the right to choose?
*Is Alex super defensive about how he wasn't drunk over inauguration weekend, despite very clear evidence that he was?
*How not gay is Alex?
*Is the universe really just a "spiritual spider web?"

*Alex claims women with liberal men are automatically attracted to him but are afraid of him
*Alex has paid for abortions
